alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 05 at 6:47PM CDT until August 05 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL GREENE COUNTY... At 647 PM CDT, Emergency management reported that Wilsons Creek was flooded near Scenic Avenue in Springfield. This flood wave will continue downstream along Wilson`s Creek, possibly overtopping Farm Road 146 near Rutledge Wilson Farm. The heavy rain has ended. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding along Wilsons Creek through southwest Springfield is expected. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Springfield, Battlefield and Brookline. This includes the following low water crossings... Wilson`s Creek at Farm Road 150, Wilson Creek at Farm Road 156 and Wilson Creek at Farm Road 146. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
